Name: Blinding Attacks
OtherEffect: The target is blinded (save ends).

Name: Concussion
OtherEffect: The target is stunned (save ends).

Name: Frighten
OtherEffect: The target is frightened of you (save ends).

Name: Knockdown
OtherEffect: The target falls prone.

Name: Poison Attack
OtherEffect: The target is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Sticky Floor
SpellDesc: The targeted area is difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Name: Barrier
SpellDesc: The targeted area is impassable and grants total cover.

Name: Zone of Darkness
SpellDesc: The targeted area is filled with magical darkness.

Name: Zone of Pain
SpellDesc: The targeted area is unstable. Creatures which move into or end their turn within the area take damage.

Name: Explosive Force
OtherEffect: All enemies are knocked away from the center of the area.

Name: Get Over Here
OtherEffect: The target is pulled up to 10 ft. towards you.

Name: Pinning Attack
OtherEffect: The target is restrained (save ends).

Name: Knockback
OtherEffect: The target is pushed up to 10 ft. from you.

Name: Reshuffle
OtherEffect: You move both yourself and the target 5 ft. in any direction. This movement doesn't trigger opportunity attacks.

Name: Raise Shield
OtherEffect: You gain +2 AC and advantage on one saving throw of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Name: Immunity
OtherEffect: You are immune to one damage type or one condition of your choice until the end of your next turn.

Name: Determination
OtherEffect: Requires you are below 25% hit points. You gain temporary hit points equal to twice your combat level

Name: Relentless
OtherEffect: When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you are instead reduced to 1 hit point.

Name: Shockproof
OtherEffect: Requires you have at least 25% hit points. Until the end of your next turn, any critical hit made against you counts as a normal hit.

Name: Get Behind Me
SpellDesc: Until the effect ends, adjacent allies count as having three-quarters cover.

Name: Hit Me
SpellDesc: A marked creature has disadvantage on any attack roll that doesn't include you.
OtherEffect: The creature is marked.

Name: Shield Wall
OtherEffect: You grant an adjacent target total cover until the start of your next turn. You must remain adjacent to the target to maintain this effect.

Name: Got Your Back
OtherEffect: If you are adjacent to an ally that is the target of an attack which doesn't include you, you can redirect the attack onto yourself.

Name: I'm Right Beside You
OtherEffect: When a nearby ally is attacked, you can move up to half your speed towards that ally.

Name: Watchful
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, creatures always provoke opportunity attacks from you (even if they disengage before leaving your reach).

Name: Difficult Space
OtherEffect: The spaces within your reach are difficult terrain to enemies.

Name: Stick Around
OtherEffect: The target is grappled by you.

Name: Dangerous Area
OtherEffect: Any enemy that starts their turn within or moves into your reach takes damage equal to your combat level (once per turn).

Name: Trip
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target with an opportunity attack, the target falls prone.

Name: Deathtouch
OtherEffect: Whenever you critically hit a creature with an attack, the creature immediately gains one failed death saving throw.

Name: The Grave Beckons
OtherEffect: The target loses one unspent hit die (ongoing).

Name: Piercing Wounds
OtherEffect: Choose one damage type. Until the end of your next turn, your abilities ignore resistance to this damage and treat immunity as resistance.

Name: Marked for Death
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a creature within 30 ft. of you that has 50% hit points or more, the creature is Marked for Death. While Marked, if the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it suffers instant death.

Name: System Shock
OtherEffect: Whenever you reduce a target to 0 hit points, it gains one level of exhaustion.

Name: Stay Down
OtherEffect: If the target is prone, it becomes restrained until the end of your next turn.

Name: Hold Still
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target that moved 10 ft. or less during its last turn, the target falls prone.

Name: Sneak Attack
OtherEffect: Whenever you hit a target with an attack roll with advantage, you deal additional damage equal to your combat level.

Name: Jump Scare
OtherEffect: If the target is blinded or frightened, it becomes stunned until the end of your next turn.

Name: Pressure Point
OtherEffect: If the target is restrained, it becomes paralyzed until the end of your next turn.

Name: Guerilla
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, you don't reveal yourself or your place of hiding if you make an attack while hidden.

Name: Vanish
OtherEffect: You become invisible. Making an attack or casting a spell ends this effect.

Name: Camouflage
OtherEffect: You blend into your surroundings and become compeltely indistinguishable from the environment. Moving, making an attack, or casting a spell ends this effect.

Name: Smoke Bomb
OtherEffect: The area is heavily obscured until the end of your next turn.

Name: Flash Bomb
OtherEffect: Targets are blinded until the end of their next turn.

Name: Always On Duty
OtherEffect: YOu can't be surprised and hidden creatures don't gain advantage on attack rolls against you.

Name: Flare
OtherEffect: The target is outlined in a dim light until the end of your next turn. While outlined, attack rolls against the target have advantage if the attacker can see it, and the target can't turn invisible.

Name: Watch Out
OtherEffect: When an ally that you can see would be hit by an attack, you grant it +5 AC against the attack. You must be able to see the source of the attack, and your ally must be able to hear you.

Name: Sight Beyond Sight
OtherEffect: You gain blindsight 60 ft. until the end of your next turn.

Name: Subtle Vibrations
OtherEffect: You gain tremorsense 30 ft.

Name: Relocate
OtherEffect: You are banished. When this effect ends, you reappear in an unocupied space within 30 ft.

Name: Sly Retreat
OtherEffect: When a creature moves adjacent to you or hits you with an attack, you move away up to half your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Name: Dodge
OtherEffect: When you are hit by an attack, you halve the damage you would take.

Name: Invisible
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, you are invisible. This effect ends if you make an attack or cast a spell.

Name: Escape Artist
OtherEffect: When you are grappled or restrained nonmagically, you can immediately escape or end the effect.

Name: Dasher
OtherEffect: You take the Dash action.

Name: Freedom
OtherEffect: You suffer no movement penalty when squeezing through a space.

Name: Spider Climb
OtherEffect: You gain climb speed equal to your walking speed.

Name: Liquid Snake
OtherEffect: You can stand on liquid surfaces as if they were harmless solid ground.

Name: Flyer
OtherEffect: You gain flying speed equal to half of your walk speed.

Name: Rend
OtherEffect: Ongoing.

Name: Curse
OtherEffect: The target takes this damage again each turn while concentrating.

Name: Bleed
OtherEffect: The target loses one unspent hit die (ongoing).

Name: Aggression
OtherEffect: Until the end of your next turn, your critical hit range increases by 1. In addition, you make your next attack roll with advantage.

Name: Take Aim
OtherEffect: You can't move during your turn. Make your next attack roll with advantage.

Name: Extra Lucky
OtherEffect: If you make an attack roll and roll a natural 1 or 2, reroll it. You must use the new result.

Name: Reliable Attacker
OtherEffect: When you make an attack roll, treat is as a natural 11. You may decide this after seeing the initial result.

Name: Quick Charger
OtherEffect: Choose one of your uncommon features and then a) reduce the cooldown by 1, b) reroll a recharge, or c) gain 1 charge

Name: Try Again
OtherEffect: When you miss with an attack by 1, 2, or 3, reroll the attack. You must use the new result.

Name: Void Magic
OtherEffect: The targets lose their lowest unspent spell slot.

Name: Destruction
OtherEffect: Creatures that move into or end their turn in the area must save or take damage.

Name: Drain Life
OtherEffect: Targets gain one level of exhaustion

Name: Ferocity
SpellDesc: Affects chosen allies in the area. Until the end of their next turn, each ally increases their critical hit range by +1, and may reroll any attack that is a natural 1.

Name: Piercing
SpellDesc: Choose one ally. Until the end of their turn, the ally's attacks ignore resistance to one damage type and treat immunity as if it were resistance.

Name: Enchanter
SpellDesc: Allies in the area may change their attack damage type to one of your choosing.

Name: Haste
SpellDesc: Choose one ally. They gain +10 speed.

Name: Recharger
SpellDesc: Choose one ally. They may immediately recharge one exhausted uncommon feature.

Name: Commander
OtherEffect: Choose one ally. They may spend their reaction to make a basic attack against a target of your choice.

Name: Checkmate
OtherEffect: Choose one ally. You may move them up to 10 ft. in a direction. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Name: Direct the Attack
OtherEffect: The target is market until the end of your next turn. Allies have advantage on their first attack roll made against the marked creature.

Name: Not Like That
OtherEffect: When an ally you can see and who can hear you misses with an attack, they may reroll the attack with advantage.

Name: Mass Teleport
SpellDesc: Choose allies within the area. Each ally is teleported to an unoccupied space of your choice within 40 ft. of their original position.

Name: Purifier
SpellDesc: Choose an ally. They may roll a saving throw against an ongoing effect.

Name: Shielder
SpellDesc: Choose one ally. They gain temporary hit points equal to three times your combat level.

Name: Not On My Watch
SpellDesc: When an ally would be reduced to 0 hit points, they are reduced to 1 hit point instead.

Name: Mass Heal
SpellDesc: Allies of your choice within the area regain hit points equal to twice your combat level.

Name: Regenerator
SpellDesc: Choose an ally. They regain hit points equal to twice your combat level (ongoing).

Name: Focused
OtherEffect: You have advantage on Concentration saving throws.

Name: Opportunist
OtherEffect: When you make an attack of opportunity, you have advantage

Name: Sneaky
OtherEffect: You take the hide action.

Name: Evasive
OtherEffect: You take the disengage action.

Name: Brutal
OtherEffect: You critically hit on a role of 19-20.

Name: Supportive
OtherEffect: You take the help action.
